patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.rp_filter=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.default.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_echo_ignore_broadcasts=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.icmp_ignore_bogus_error_responses=1

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_syn_backlog=30000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.send_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_redirects=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.accept_source_route=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv6.conf.all.forwarding=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_slow_start_after_idle=0

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_window_scaling=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_timestamp=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_established=300

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_generic_timeout=300

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_max_tw_buckets=2000000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081
        - name: prom-metrics
          containerPort: 8080
        env:
        - name: BANIAS_PROJECTID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PROJECTID
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_DEBUG
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_TOPIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_TOPIC
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW

      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test

        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081

          containerPort: 8080
        env:

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:

              name: banias-frontend-config

          valueFrom:

          valueFrom:

        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: banias-frontend
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: banias-frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: banias-frontend
        k8s-app: banias-frontend
    spec:
      initContainers:
      - name: init-sysctl
        image: busybox:stable
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - 'sysctl -w net.ipv4.ip_forward=0

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmnb=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.msgmax=65536

          sysctl -w kernel.shmmax=68719476736

          sysctl -w kernel.shmall=4294967296

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w fs.file-max=100000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_syncookies=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.conf.all.log_martians=0

          sysctl -w net.core.somaxconn=50000

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_sack=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=htcp

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_time=60

          sysctl -w net.netfilter.nf_conntrack_tcp_timeout_time_wait=10

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G

        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG

        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH

        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS

          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json

        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key

metadata:

spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:

  template:
    metadata:

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_fin_timeout=10

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_tw_reuse=1

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_intvl=15

          sysctl -w net.ipv4.tcp_keepalive_probes=5

          '
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
      containers:
      - name: banias-frontend
        image: gcr.io/my-project/banias-frontend:test
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: '3'
            memory: 12G
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 200Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - name: google-cloud-key
          mountPath: /var/secrets/google
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8081
        - name: prom-metrics
          containerPort: 8080
        env:
        - name: BANIAS_PROJECTID
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PROJECTID
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_DEBUG
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_DEBUG
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_TOPIC
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_TOPIC
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_METRICSPORT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXBATCH
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBAGGRIGATORS
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_PUBSUBMAXPUBLISHDELAY
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINESAMOUNT
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: BANIAS_MAXPUBSUBGOROUTINEIDLEDURATION
              name: banias-frontend-config
        - name: GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS
          value: /var/secrets/google/key.json
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: google-cloud-key
        secret:
          secretName: pubsub-key

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  namespace: default
  name: deck
  labels:
    app: deck
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: deck
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: deck
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: deck
      containers:
      - name: deck
        image: gcr.io/k8s-prow/deck:v20210305-350f3b2f2e
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        ports:
        - name: http
          containerPort: 8080
        args:
        - --kubeconfig=/etc/kubeconfig/config
        - --tide-url=http://tide/
        - --hook-url=http://hook:8888/plugin-help
        - --redirect-http-to=prow.k8s.io
        - --oauth-url=/github-login
        - --config-path=/etc/config/config.yaml
        - --job-config-path=/etc/job-config
        - --spyglass=true
        - --rerun-creates-job
        - --github-token-path=/etc/github/oauth
        - --github-endpoint=http://ghproxy
        - --github-endpoint=https://api.github.com
        - --github-oauth-config-file=/etc/githuboauth/secret
        - --cookie-secret=/etc/cookie/secret
        - --plugin-config=/etc/plugins/plugins.yaml
        volumeMounts:
        - name: oauth-config
          mountPath: /etc/githuboauth
          readOnly: true
        - name: cookie-secret
          mountPath: /etc/cookie
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/kubeconfig
          name: kubeconfig
          readOnly: true
        - name: config
          mountPath: /etc/config
          readOnly: true
        - name: job-config
          mountPath: /etc/job-config
          readOnly: true
        - name: oauth-token
          mountPath: /etc/github
          readOnly: true
        - name: plugins
          mountPath: /etc/plugins
          readOnly: true
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz/ready
            port: 8081
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 3
          timeoutSeconds: 600
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: oauth-config
        secret:
          secretName: github-oauth-config
      - name: oauth-token
        secret:
          secretName: oauth-token
      - name: cookie-secret
        secret:
          secretName: cookie
      - name: kubeconfig
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: kubeconfig
      - name: config
        configMap:
          name: config
      - name: job-config
        configMap:
          name: job-config
      - name: plugins
        configMap:
          name: plugins
